panels.description: Has other non-visible stats too which can be enabled in future.
Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Load shouldn't exceed number of threads.
panels.title: System Load %

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: Disk Space Used (/dev devices)
